fields.name: magnetism friction
fields.comment: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

fields.name: magnetism adhesion
fields.comment: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

fields.name: inconsequential target scale
fields.comment: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

fields.name: look acceleration time
fields.comment: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

fields.name: look acceleration scale
fields.comment: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

fields.name: look peg threshold [0,1]
fields.comment: magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

fields.name: look autolevelling scale
fields.comment: 1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

fields.name: minimum weapon swap ticks
fields.comment: amount of time player needs to hold down ACTION to pick up a new weapon

fields.name: minimum autolevelling ticks
fields.comment: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

fields.name: minimum angle for vehicle flipping
fields.comment: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up

fields.name: grenades
fields.explanation: difficulty-affecting values for enemy grenade behavior

fields.name: easy grenade chance scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on easy difficulty

fields.name: normal grenade chance scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on normal difficulty

fields.name: hard grenade chance scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on hard difficulty

fields.name: imposs. grenade chance scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on impossible difficulty

fields.name: easy grenade timer scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on easy difficulty

fields.name: normal grenade timer scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on normal difficulty

fields.name: hard grenade timer scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on hard difficulty

fields.name: imposs. grenade timer scale
fields.comment: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on impossible difficulty

fields.name: easy major upgrade (normal)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on easy difficulty

fields.name: normal major upgrade (normal)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on normal difficulty

fields.name: hard major upgrade (normal)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on hard difficulty

fields.name: imposs. major upgrade (normal)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on impossible difficulty

fields.name: easy major upgrade (few)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on easy difficulty

fields.name: normal major upgrade (few)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on normal difficulty

fields.name: hard major upgrade (few)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on hard difficulty

fields.name: imposs. major upgrade (few)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on impossible difficulty

fields.name: easy major upgrade (many)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on easy difficulty

fields.name: normal major upgrade (many)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on normal difficulty

fields.name: hard major upgrade (many)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on hard difficulty

fields.name: imposs. major upgrade (many)
fields.comment: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on impossible difficulty

fields.name: function textures
fields.explanation: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Do not change unless you know what you're doing!)

fields.name: linear corner fade
fields.comment: used for shadows

fields.name: default textures
fields.explanation: Used internally by the rasterizer - additive, multiplicative, detail, vector. (Do not change ever, period.)

fields.name: experimental textures
fields.explanation: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Used by Bernie's experimental shaders.)

fields.name: PC textures
fields.explanation: The PC can't use 3D textures, so we use this instead.

fields.name: distance attenuation 2D
fields.comment: the pc can't use 3d textures, so we use this instead

fields.name: stun movement penalty
fields.comment: 1.0 prevents moving while stunned

fields.name: stun turning penalty
fields.comment: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

fields.name: stun jumping penalty
fields.comment: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

fields.name: minimum stun time
fields.comment: all stunning damage will last for at least this long

fields.name: maximum stun time
fields.comment: no stunning damage will last for longer than this

fields.name: velocity scale
fields.comment: scales initial velocity

fields.name: radius
fields.comment: particle radius

fields.name: vehicle terrain parameters
fields.explanation: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

fields.name: ground friction scale
fields.comment: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

fields.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
fields.comment: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

fields.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
fields.comment: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

fields.name: ground depth scale
fields.comment: depth a point mass rests in the ground

fields.name: ground damp fraction scale
fields.comment: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick
